transcript:
him and from that time till they came to Moscow had not left them for a day. 
"Yes, he is very handsome," thought Pierre, "and I know him. It would be particularly pleasant to him to dishonor my name and rid- icule me, just because I have exerted myself on his behalf, befriended him, and helped him. I know and understand what a spice that would add to the pleasure of deceiving me, if it real- ly were true. Yes, if it were true, but I do not believe it. I have no right to, and can't, believe it.
